rows.label: tlk20010151_01_msg0001
rows.name:
My master thinks of me as
if I were family... He is
a truly gentle person.

rows.label: tlk20010151_01_msg0002
rows.name:
However... he still isn't used
to combat, and it seems the
sight of blood frightens him.

rows.label: tlk20010151_01_msg0003
rows.name:
The line between kindness and weakness is
a fine one. I am resolved to do my utmost
to support my master in any way I can.
